responseText: The 'Heartstone Locket'... it was to be my magnum opus. An artifact capable of amplifying the wearer's own spirit, resonating with the very core of the mountain. But the inlay work, the precise gem alignments for the final binding matrix... it proved too complex. My focus wavered, my mind... it fractured under the strain. My rivals, those jealous fools from the magma forges under Mt. Dun, sensed my weakness and sought to steal my research. I sealed the forge before they could...
name: ANV_FTUE_0011_VarnoksJournal_1_Response
